title: Best of The Herd: 08/06/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/06/2018
description:
Colin talks about the similarities between Russell Westbrook and Cam Newton after a former Panthers WR takes a shot at Cam. He talks about where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, former NFL Cornerback DeAngelo Hall comes in studio to talk about the Hall of Fame class and why it matters so much which team drafts you. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
